General_Description: '''Dances with Witches''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: The provocative dancing of a witch when collecting [[mandrake]] was distracting for a farmer's husband and farmhands. The farmer wanted the root delivered.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
